channel.title: Restless Town
channel.description: Restless Town is collection of furry short fiction set in the fictional town of Sawtooth, Idaho.
channel.itunes:author: Madison Scott-Clary
channel.itunes:subtitle: Restless Town is a collection of furry short fiction set in the fictional town of Sawtooth, Idaho.
channel.itunes:summary: Restless Town is a collection of furry short fiction set in the fictional town of Sawtooth, Idaho. Exploring the themes of gender, love, queer relationships, and mental health, these stories reflect, through their characters, the struggles of the wider world.

item.title: The Fool
item.description: A student and a motherly badger explore questions of identity through a tarot reading.
item.itunes:author: Madison Scott-Clary
item.itunes:subtitle: A student and a motherly badger explore questions of identity through a tarot reading.
item.itunes:summary: A student and a motherly badger explore questions of identity through a tarot reading.
item.itunes:keywords: fiction, short story, furry, tarot, transgender, gender

item.title: About Sawtooth
item.description: A bit more about the town of Sawtooth, Idaho, as well as information on how to support the writing.
item.itunes:author: Madison Scott-Clary
item.itunes:subtitle: A bit more about the town of Sawtooth, Idaho, as well as information on how to support the writing.
item.itunes:summary: A bit more about the town of Sawtooth, Idaho, as well as information on how to support the writing.

item.title: Disappearance
item.description: A weasel attempts to escape from her life in Sawtooth to Oregon, but finds her old life still tied to home.
item.itunes:author: Madison Scott-Clary
item.itunes:subtitle: A weasel attempts to escape from her life in Sawtooth to Oregon, but finds her old life still tied to home.
item.itunes:summary: A weasel attempts to escape from her life in Sawtooth to Oregon, but finds her old life still tied to home.

item.title: Fisher
item.description: A fisher walks and hunts for meaning.
item.itunes:author: Madison Scott-Clary
item.itunes:subtitle: A fisher walks and hunts for meaning.
item.itunes:summary: A fisher walks and hunts for meaning.

item.title: Centerpiece
item.description: A couple heads to a BDSM play party where the wife will be the Centerpiece for the whole party to enjoy. With fertility already on the mind, will another mink showing up throw a wrench in things?
item.itunes:author: Madison Scott-Clary
item.itunes:subtitle: A couple heads to a BDSM play party where the wife will be the Centerpiece for the whole party to enjoy. With fertility already on the mind, will another mink showing up throw a wrench in things?
item.itunes:summary: A couple heads to a BDSM play party where the wife will be the Centerpiece for the whole party to enjoy. With fertility already on the mind, will another mink showing up throw a wrench in things?

item.title: You're Gone
item.description: A husband grieves the loss of his wife through an audio diary.
item.itunes:author: Madison Scott-Clary
item.itunes:subtitle: A husband grieves the loss of his wife through an audio diary.
item.itunes:summary: A husband grieves the loss of his wife through an audio diary.
